item.title: EmberGen
item.description: JangaFX are the creators of the 3D animation software EmberGen written fully in Odin. <video width="100%" autoplay loop muted class="showcase-preview"><source src="https://jangafx.com/Q12021Launch/Media_Organized/videos/EmberGen/Film/film-composite.mp4"></video>
